data.question: What is the empirical composition of the pale yellow crystalline material obtained from the reaction of ferrocene with molten imidazole?
What type of magnetic behavior does Fe3(imid)6(imidH)2 exhibit below 17 K?
What is the magnetic phase transition temperature of Fe3(imid)6(imidH)2?
What are the two types of iron centers in Fe3(imid)6(imidH)2?
What is the role of imidazolate ions in the structure of Fe3(imid)6(imidH)2?
What is the coercive field of Fe3(imid)6(imidH)2 at 4.8 K?
How does the structure of Fe3(imid)6(imidH)2 facilitate weak ferromagnetism?
Is the magnetic coupling between tetrahedral iron centers in Fe3(imid)6(imidH)2 ferromagnetic or antiferromagnetic?
Does Fe3(imid)6(imidH)2 exhibit a linear or non-linear magnetization with applied field above 17 K?
Is the magnetic moment of Fe3(imid)6(imidH)2 temperature-dependent above 17 K?
Does Fe3(imid)6(imidH)2 have a higher coercive field than [Fe(4-imidazoleacetate)2]x·2CH3OH?
Are the Fe−N bond distances around the octahedral Fe(1) longer than those around the tetrahedral Fe(2) in Fe3(imid)6(imidH)2?
Does Fe3(imid)6(imidH)2 exhibit a net magnetization at zero applied field below 17 K?
Is the maximum magnetization of Fe3(imid)6(imidH)2 at 2 K and 55,000 G equal to the theoretical saturation magnetization?
Does the structure of Fe3(imid)6(imidH)2 consist of chains of tetrahedral iron centers cross-linked via octahedral iron ions?
Is the remnant magnetization of Fe3(imid)6(imidH)2 at 4.8 K higher than that of [Fe(biimidazolate)]x·CH3OH·0.5H2O?
What is the dihedral angle between vectors bisecting the N−Fe−N intrachain angles on adjacent tetrahedral iron atoms in Fe3(imid)6(imidH)2?
What is the role of octahedral iron centers in promoting 3-D order in Fe3(imid)6(imidH)2?
data.answer: Coordinative links between chains of tetrahedral iron centers

data.question: Does the presence of octahedral iron centers in Fe3(imid)6(imidH)2 contribute to its magnetic properties?
Is the antiferromagnetic coupling in Fe3(imid)6(imidH)2 stronger than in [CuCl(imid)(imidH)2]x?
